data.title: UN Report: Global violent crime rates surge 12% in early 2026
data.snippet: A new UN report highlights a sharp rise in violent crime across urban centers worldwide, with Latin America and Sub-Saharan Africa seeing the largest increases.

data.title: Gang violence displaces thousands in Haiti's capital Port-au-Prince
data.snippet: Escalating gang warfare in Port-au-Prince has forced over 15,000 residents to flee their homes in the past month alone.

data.title: India sees spike in communal violence incidents across three states
data.snippet: Communal clashes reported in Uttar Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh and Rajasthan have prompted central government to deploy additional security forces.

data.title: School shooting prevention AI system deployed across US districts
data.snippet: New AI-powered threat detection systems are being rolled out in over 500 US school districts following a surge in campus violence reports.

data.title: European Parliament debates stricter penalties for online incitement to violence
data.snippet: MEPs discuss proposed regulations targeting platforms that fail to remove content inciting real-world violence within 24 hours.

data.title: Brazil's homicide rate drops in São Paulo but rises in northern states
data.snippet: While São Paulo reports a 15% decline in homicides, states like Pará and Amazonas see alarming increases linked to land disputes.

data.title: Philippines anti-drug campaign faces renewed scrutiny after extrajudicial killing reports
data.snippet: Human rights organizations document fresh cases of alleged extrajudicial killings in Manila's poorest neighborhoods.

data.title: UN Special Rapporteur warns of rising hate speech fueling real-world violence
data.snippet: The Special Rapporteur on freedom of expression highlights how online hate speech is directly linked to violent attacks against minorities.

data.title: India bans 12 organizations under UAPA for promoting separatism and violence
data.snippet: The Ministry of Home Affairs designates a dozen organizations as unlawful associations under the Unlawful Activities Prevention Act.
